title.rendered: “Drone Surveillance Identifies Hezbollah Terrorists: IDF’s Golani Brigade Takes Action with Airstrikes”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Golani Brigade soldiers identified Hezbollah terrorists with a drone: combat aircraft attacked the building in which they were staying.

The soldiers of the Golani Brigade identified earlier today via drone a number of terrorists from the Hezbollah organization. The terrorists were in a military building in the area of Blida in southern Lebanon, which, after being spotted, was attacked by Air Force combat planes.

In relation to the alarms that were activated a short while ago due to an intrusion of a hostile aircraft in the area of the Western Galilee, it was a false identification. In addition, a single launch was identified from Lebanese territory, there were no casualties.

Attached is footage of the attack on the military building in which the terrorists were located: https://bit.ly/3Q7Nuyg.
